    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="ca">Els valors cívics de l'esport</string>
            <string language="en">Social value of sport</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwert des Sports</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Valeur sociale de sport</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Valor social do esporte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Valore sociale dello sport</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνική αξία του αθλητισμού</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Recull d'experiències educatives relacionades amb els valors cívics de l'esport i realitzades en el marc de l'Any Europeu de l'Educació per mitjà de l'esport (2004).</string>
            <string language="en">A collection of experiences related to the social value of sport, carried out within the framework of the European Year of Education through Sport (2004).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">material didàctic</string>
            <string language="en">teaching materials</string>
            <string language="es">material didáctico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">sistema de valors</string>
            <string language="en">value system</string>
            <string language="es">sistema de valores</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">vehicle</string>
            <string language="en">vehicule</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Ansammlung Erfahrungen stand auf dem 
Sozialwert des Sports in Verbindung, durchgeführt im Rahmen des 
europäischen Jahres der Ausbildung durch Sport (2004).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une collection d'expériences a associé à la 
valeur sociale du sport, effectuée dans le cadre de l'année 
européenne de l'éducation par le sport (2004).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma coleção das experiências relacionou-se ao 
valor social do esporte, realizado dentro da estrutura do ano europeu 
da instrução com o esporte (2004).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una collezione di esperienze si è riferita al 
valore sociale dello sport, effettuato nel quadro dell'anno europeo di
formazione con lo sport (2004).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια συλλογή της εμπειρίας αφορούσε την κοινωνική αξία
του αθλητισμού, που πραγματοποιείται στα πλαίσια του ευρωπαϊκού 
έτους εκπαίδευσης μέσω του αθλητισμού (2004).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lehrmittel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wertsystem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">vehicule</string>
          </keyword>
